header.description: This plugin provides extensions to current WebSphere Application Server (WAS - Deploy - Ext) plugin

step-type.name: BuildModuleToServerMap
step-type.description: Map a target(server/cluster) to a list of modules of an Enterprise Application.

server:property-ui.label: Application Name
server:property-ui.description: The name of the application being installed (Used for WebSphere reference).

server:property-ui.label: Module Names
server:property-ui.description: The URIs for the modules. e.g. PlantsByWebSphere.war,WEB-INF/web.xml

server:property-ui.label: Output Map Property
server:property-ui.description: The output property name to set with Module Map argument.
